scripts.build-android: (export MY_ENV=dev || set MY_ENV=dev) && ionic cordova build android
scripts.build-android-prod: (export MY_ENV=prod || set MY_ENV=prod) && ionic cordova build android --release
scripts.build-android-dev: (export MY_ENV=dev || set MY_ENV=dev) && ionic cordova build android
scripts.run-android: (export MY_ENV=dev || set MY_ENV=dev) && cordova run android --device
scripts.run-android-dev: (export MY_ENV=dev || set MY_ENV=dev) && cordova run android --device
scripts.run-android-prod: (export MY_ENV=prod || set MY_ENV=prod) && cordova run android --device --release
scripts.build-run-android: (export MY_ENV=dev || set MY_ENV=dev) && ionic cordova build android && cordova run android --device
scripts.build-run-android-dev: (export MY_ENV=dev || set MY_ENV=dev) && ionic cordova build android && cordova run android --device
scripts.build-run-android-prod: (export MY_ENV=prod || set MY_ENV=prod) &&  ionic cordova build android && cordova run android --device
scripts.build-ios: (export MY_ENV=dev || set MY_ENV=dev) && ionic cordova build ios
scripts.build-ios-prod: (export MY_ENV=prod || set MY_ENV=prod) && ionic cordova build ios
scripts.build-ios-dev: (export MY_ENV=dev || set MY_ENV=dev) && ionic cordova build ios
scripts.run-ios: (export MY_ENV=dev || set MY_ENV=dev) && cordova run ios --device
scripts.run-ios-dev: (export MY_ENV=dev || set MY_ENV=dev) && cordova run ios --device
scripts.run-ios-prod: (export MY_ENV=prod || set MY_ENV=prod) && cordova run ios --device  --release
scripts.build-run-ios: (export MY_ENV=dev || set MY_ENV=dev) && ionic cordova build ios && cordova run ios --device
scripts.build-run-ios-dev: (export MY_ENV=dev || set MY_ENV=dev) && ionic cordova build ios && cordova run ios --device
scripts.build-run-ios-prod: (export MY_ENV=prod || set MY_ENV=prod) &&  ionic cordova build ios --prod && cordova run ios --device
scripts.reset-android-plugins: rm -rf platforms/android plugins/* && ionic cordova platform add android
scripts.create-android-version: (export MY_ENV=prod || set MY_ENV=prod) && ionic cordova build android --release && jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore ../../keystore/healthshirt.keystore ./platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk healthshirt && zipalign -v 4 ./platforms/android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release-unsigned.apk HealthShirt.apk
